function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of effective recovery activities defined","Impact":"Delayed restoration of system functionality","Mitigation":"Clearly define and prioritize recovery activities based on importance","Technologies":"Resilience formulation, stochastic resilience metrics","People":"System stakeholders, researchers","Owner":"System stakeholders, researchers"},{"Description":"Reliance on imprecise probabilities for quantifying resilience","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of system resilience","Mitigation":"Use of more precise probabilistic models for quantifying resilience","Technologies":"Precise probabilistic models, advanced statistical methods","People":"Risk experts, researchers","Owner":"Risk experts, researchers"},{"Description":"Inadequate identification of primary contributors to network resilience","Impact":"Ineffective resilience planning and allocation of resources","Mitigation":"Use of stochastic resilience-based component importance measures (CIMs)","Technologies":"Resilience formulation, stochastic resilience metrics","People":"System stakeholders, researchers","Owner":"System stakeholders, researchers"}]}
